00035 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00036 #include "config.h"
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #ifdef _SOLARIS
00040 #include "solaris_port.h"
00041 #endif

00043 #include <stdio.h>
00044 #include <string.h>
00045 #include <pthread.h>
00046 #include "nfs_core.h"
00047 #include "log.h"
00048 #include "cache_inode.h"
00049 #include "fsal.h"
00050 #include "9p.h"
00051 
00052 
00053 int _9p_auth( _9p_request_data_t * preq9p,
00054               void  * pworker_data,
00055               u32 * plenout,
00056               char * preply)
00057 {
00058   char * cursor = preq9p->_9pmsg + _9P_HDR_SIZE + _9P_TYPE_SIZE ;
00059   nfs_worker_data_t * pwkrdata = (nfs_worker_data_t *)pworker_data ;
00060 
00061   u16 * msgtag = NULL ;
00062   u32 * afid = NULL ;
00063   u16 * uname_len = NULL ;
00064   char * uname_str = NULL ;
00065   u16 * aname_len = NULL ;
00066   char * aname_str = NULL ;
00067   u32 * n_aname = NULL ;
00068 
00069   fsal_attrib_list_t fsalattr ;
00070 
00071   u32 err = 0 ;
00072  
00073   _9p_fid_t * pfid = NULL ;
00074 
00075   exportlist_t * pexport = NULL;
00076   unsigned int found = FALSE;
00077   cache_inode_status_t cache_status ;
00078   cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsdata ;
00079 
00080   if ( !preq9p || !pworker_data || !plenout || !preply )
00081    return -1 ;
00082 
00083   /* Get data */
00084   _9p_getptr( cursor, msgtag, u16 ) ; 
00085   _9p_getptr( cursor, afid,   u32 ) ; 
00086   _9p_getstr( cursor, uname_len, uname_str ) ;
00087   _9p_getstr( cursor, aname_len, aname_str ) ;
00088   _9p_getptr( cursor, n_aname, u32 ) ; 
00089 
00090   LogDebug( COMPONENT_9P, "TAUTH: tag=%u afid=%d uname='%.*s' aname='%.*s' n_uname=%d", 
00091             (u32)*msgtag, *afid, (int)*uname_len, uname_str, (int)*aname_len, aname_str, *n_aname ) ;
00092 
00093   /*
00094    * Find the export for the aname (using as well Path or Tag ) 
00095    */
00096   for( pexport = nfs_param.pexportlist; pexport != NULL;
00097        pexport = pexport->next)
00098     {
00099       if(aname_str[0] != '/')
00100         {
00101           /* The input value may be a "Tag" */
00102           if(!strncmp(aname_str, pexport->FS_tag, strlen( pexport->FS_tag ) ) )
00103             {
00104               found = TRUE ;
00105               break;
00106             }
00107         }
00108       else
00109         {
00110           if(!strncmp(aname_str, pexport->fullpath, strlen( pexport->fullpath ) ) )
00111            {
00112               found = TRUE ;
00113               break;
00114            }
00115         }
00116     } /* for */
00117 
00118   /* Did we find something ? */
00119   if( found == FALSE )
00120    return _9p_rerror( preq9p, msgtag, ENOENT, plenout, preply ) ;
00121 
00122   if( *afid >= _9P_FID_PER_CONN )
00123    return _9p_rerror( preq9p, msgtag, ERANGE, plenout, preply ) ;
00124  
00125   /* Set pexport and fid id in fid */
00126   pfid= &preq9p->pconn->fids[*afid] ;
00127   pfid->pexport = pexport ;
00128   pfid->fid = *afid ;
00129   memcpy( &pfid->fsal_op_context, &pwkrdata->thread_fsal_context, sizeof( fsal_op_context_t ) ) ;
00130 
00131   /* Is user name provided as a string or as an uid ? */
00132   if( *uname_len != 0 )
00133    {
00134      /* Build the fid creds */
00135     if( ( err = _9p_tools_get_fsal_op_context_by_name( *uname_len, uname_str, pfid ) ) !=  0 )
00136        return _9p_rerror( preq9p, msgtag, -err, plenout, preply ) ;
00137    }
00138   else
00139    {
00140     /* Build the fid creds */
00141     if( ( err = _9p_tools_get_fsal_op_context_by_uid( *n_aname, pfid ) ) !=  0 )
00142        return _9p_rerror( preq9p, msgtag, -err, plenout, preply ) ;
00143    }
00144 
00145   /* Get the related pentry */
00146   fsdata.fh_desc.start = (char *)pexport->proot_handle ;
00147   fsdata.fh_desc.len = sizeof( fsal_handle_t ) ;
00148 
00149   pfid->pentry = cache_inode_get( &fsdata,
00150                                   &fsalattr,
00151                                   &pfid->fsal_op_context,
00152                                   NULL,
00153                                   &cache_status ) ;
00154 
00155   if( pfid->pentry == NULL )
00156     return _9p_rerror( preq9p, msgtag,  _9p_tools_errno( cache_status ),  plenout, preply ) ;
00157 
00158   /* Compute the qid */
00159   pfid->qid.type = _9P_QTDIR ;
00160   pfid->qid.version = 0 ; /* No cache, we want the client to stay synchronous with the server */
00161   pfid->qid.path = fsalattr.fileid ;
00162 
00163   /* Build the reply */
00164   _9p_setinitptr( cursor, preply, _9P_RATTACH ) ;
00165   _9p_setptr( cursor, msgtag, u16 ) ;
00166 
00167   _9p_setqid( cursor, pfid->qid ) ;
00168 
00169   _9p_setendptr( cursor, preply ) ;
00170   _9p_checkbound( cursor, preply, plenout ) ;
00171 
00172   LogDebug( COMPONENT_9P, "RAUTH: tag=%u afid=%u qid=(type=%u,version=%u,path=%llu)", 
00173             *msgtag, *afid, (u32)pfid->qid.type, pfid->qid.version, (unsigned long long)pfid->qid.path ) ;
00174 
00175   return 1 ;
00176 }
